mapper.select: select write_code, w.id, nickname, pet_code, title, TEXT, filename, DATE, hit, address FROM member m, writer w where w.id = m.id and write_code = #{write_code}
select count(*) from writer w, member m where m.id = w.id
mapper.update: UPDATE writer SET hit = hit+1 WHERE write_code=#{write_code}

choose.when: and address=#{address} and (nickname like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or text like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
